attributes.additional_details: I think that the public should be able to have a no confidence vote on the political party running the country e.g. prime minister and cabinet members, we should have the right to do this every 3 years by that time we have given the politicians the chance to show improvement and if they are truely looking after the well being of the citizens, This will allow the public to vote for a re ellection if a large proportion of England citizens are un supportive and have lost faith in the prime minister and his political party.
